languages.text: Каллигос Винтерскейл прознал, что секрет газовых факторий был украден у него. Однако он готов забыть об этой "неприятности" и сулит возможность приобрести куда больший куш. Его пленила идея отобрать у династии Чорда нефиумные скважины на замерзшем мире Дыхание Люцина. Кажется, самого Каллигоса больше прельщает не выгода, а возможность перерезать множество слуг династии Чорда в планетарных боях. В обмен на людей, которых ему так не хватает, он готов платить бесценной горючей жидкостью.

Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.

For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the priceless flammable liquid for the fighting force he desperately lacks.

languages.text: Calligos Winterscale ha descubierto que se le ha robado el secreto de sus factoriums de gas. Sin embargo, está dispuesto a dejar pasar este «lamentable incidente» y ofrece una propuesta mucho más lucrativa. Le atrae la idea de apoderarse de las plataformas de extracción de nefio de la casa Chorda en el mundo helado de Aliento de Lucin. Parece que para el propio Calligos los beneficios serían secundarios en comparación con la oportunidad de masacrar a los sirvientes de la casa Chorda en las batallas planetarias. Ofrece el líquido inflamable de valor incalculable como pago por las fuerzas militares de las que carece.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.

Sin embargo, está dispuesto a dejar pasar este «lamentable incidente» y ofrece una propuesta mucho más lucrativa. Le atrae la idea de apoderarse de las plataformas de extracción de nefio de la casa Chorda en el mundo helado de Aliento de Lucin. Parece que para el propio Calligos los beneficios serían secundarios en comparación con la oportunidad de masacrar a los sirvientes de la casa Chorda en las batallas planetarias. languages.text: Calligos Winterscale a découvert qu'on lui avait dérobé le secret des factoriums gaziers. Il a cependant consenti à passer l'éponge sur ce « regrettable incident » et a ouvert la porte à des initiatives autrement plus rémunératrices. Il entretient maintenant l'idée de prendre possession des puits de néphium de la maison Chorda, sur le monde gelé de Lucin Expirae. Toutefois, Calligos semble moins attiré par les profits que par l'opportunité de faire un massacre parmi les serviteurs des Chorda dans de violents combats planétaires. Il offre d'acheter les services d'une force d'attaque, dont il manque cruellement, en échange du précieux liquide inflammable susmentionné.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterscale a découvert qu'on lui avait dérobé le secret des factoriums gaziers. Il a cependant consenti à passer l'éponge sur ce « regrettable incident » et a ouvert la porte à des initiatives autrement plus rémunératrices. Il entretient maintenant l'idée de prendre possession des puits de néphium de la maison Chorda, sur le monde gelé de Lucin Expirae. Toutefois, Calligos semble moins attiré par les profits que par l'opportunité de faire un massacre parmi les serviteurs des Chorda dans de violents combats planétaires. Il offre d'acheter les services d'une force d'attaque, dont il manque cruellement, en échange du précieux liquide inflammable susmentionné.

languages.text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔发现有人盗走了他手中的气体馏分的秘密。不过，为了更长远的收益，他愿意就此无视这桩“不幸的意外”。现在，他一门心思只想抢走库尔达家族位于冰封世界“卢辛之息”上的尼非恩钻井。对卡里戈斯本人而言，金钱上的利润似乎只是一点点微不足道的附加收益，他的主要目的是在这场行星大战中屠戮库尔达家族的仆人。他十分乐意用这种珍贵的易燃液体换取他目前极度匮乏的战力。
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.

traits.locale_text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔发现有人盗走了他手中的气体馏分的秘密。不过，为了更长远的收益，他愿意就此无视这桩“不幸的意外”。现在，他一门心思只想抢走库尔达家族位于冰封世界“卢辛之息”上的尼非恩钻井。对卡里戈斯本人而言，金钱上的利润似乎只是一点点微不足道的附加收益，他的主要目的是在这场行星大战中屠戮库尔达家族的仆人。他十分乐意用这种珍贵的易燃液体换取他目前极度匮乏的战力。

languages.text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、ガス・ファクトリアムの秘密が自身のもとから盗まれたことを知った。しかし、彼はその『不運な出来事』を過去のものとし、より大きな利益を手にしようとしていた。彼は今、凍結惑星「ルシンの吐息」でチョーダ家のネフィウム・リグを奪取するというアイデアに心を奪われている。カリゴス自身にとっては、この利益では惑星での戦いでチョーダ家のしもべを大量に虐殺する機会を得るということの、副次的な産物でしかないようだ。彼は不足している戦力と引き換えに、前述の貴重な可燃性の液体を支払うと申し出ている。
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.

languages.text: Calligos Winterzunder hat herausgefunden, dass ihm das Geheimnis der Gasfactorien gestohlen wurde. Er ist jedoch bereit, diesen "unglücklichen Zwischenfall" zu vergessen, und bietet die Aussicht auf sehr viel größere Gewinne an. Er ist nun versessen von der Idee, die Nephium-Anlagen von Haus Chorda auf der gefrorenen Welt Lucins Atem zu erobern. Für Calligos selbst scheint der Profit nur ein angenehmer Nebeneffekt zu sein, die Hauptsache ist die Gelegenheit, in Planetenschlachten unzählige Diener von Haus Chorda zu massakrieren. Er bietet den eingangs erwähnten, unschätzbar wertvollen Brennstoff im Tausch gegen die Kampfkraft, an der es ihm so bitter mangelt.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.

languages.text: Calligos Winterscale, gaz fabrikalarına dair sırların kendisinden çalındığını anlamış. Ancak kendisi bu "talihsiz hadiseyi" mazide bırakmaya hazır olduğunu, çok daha büyük kazançlar sağlayacak bir teklif yapabileceğini belirtti. Chorda Hanesi'nin Lucin'in Nefesi denen donuk dünyasındaki nefyum kuyularını ele geçirme fikri kafasına takılmış. Elde edilecek kâr, Calligos için Chorda Hanesi'nin hizmetkârlarını gezegen muharebelerinde katletme fırsatının yanında devede kulakmış. Muhtaç kaldığı askerî kuvvetlerin karşılığında bahsi geçen paha biçilemez yanıcı sıvıyla ödeme yapmayı teklif ediyor.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has found out that the secret of gas factoriums had been stolen from him. However, he is willing to leave that "unfortunate incident" in the past, offering the prospect of much greater gains. He is now captivated by the idea of seizing House Chorda's nephium rigs on the frozen world of Lucin's Breath. For Calligos himself, it would appear, the profit is a mere side-benefit of the opportunity to massacre large numbers of House Chorda's servants in planetary battles. He is offering to pay with the aforementioned priceless flammable liquid in exchange for the fighting force he is desperately lacking.
